key_risks: Significant financial losses and liquidity issues
Supply chain disruptions, particularly semiconductor shortages
High competition in the commercial EV market
Reliance on a small number of large fleet customers
Regulatory and market uncertainties impacting demand
controversies: $13.35 million class action settlement due to alleged false and misleading statements
Workforce reductions and cost-cutting measures in 2023
Agreement to be placed into receivership in 2023
environmental_issues: Commitment to sustainability and zero-emission solutions, but financial instability raises questions about delivery on these commitments
social_issues: Workforce reductions from 330 to 250 employees in 2023
governance_issues: Financial instability and operational challenges leading to receivership
